Sentencas: Improving the performance of solid oxide fuel cell via maximizing its available peak power density is a key requirement of research in the field of renewable energy.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: This could be achieved through identifying the optimal controlling parameters such as, the deposition instrument power (P), the temperature (T), and the electrolyte thickness (Thick).
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: Nickel-Gadolinium Doped Ceria cermet anode films are deposited on one side of the Zirconia electrolyte by radio frequency sputtering.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: The sputtering plasma power is varied at 50,100, 150, and 200 W. Lanthanum Strontium Manganite cathodes were screen-printed on the other side of the electrolyte supports to complete the configuration.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: Cells were electrochemically tested at various intermediate solid oxide fuel cell temperatures of 600, 700 and 800 degrees C using different electrolyte thicknesses.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: The cell's current density, I (A/cm(2)) and voltage (V) and hence the power density (W/cm(2)) are recorded in each case.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: Based on the obtained experimental results, a fuzzy model is built using different control parameters.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: Then, the particle swarm optimization technique is used for obtaining the best parameters of the cell that maximizes its power density.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization

Sentencas: The results show that by utilizing the optimized conditions, the power density can be increased to 0.39 (W/cm(2)), which is almost two times higher than the maximum power density obtained experimentally.
Titulo: Improving fuel cell performance via optimal parameters identification through fuzzy logic based-modeling and optimization
